# The `PassInstrumentation` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class provides instrumentation entry points for the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> Manager, doing calls to callbacks registered in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentationcallbacks">PassInstrumentationCallbacks</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::PassInstrumentation</CodeBlock>

  isLocal="true" />
</IncludesList>

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  name={<><a href="#a405394a2ffc8cc85cd6e6be0e64d1408">PassInstrumentation</a> (PassInstrumentationCallbacks &#42;CB=nullptr)</>}>
Callbacks object is not owned by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentation">PassInstrumentation</a>, its life-time should at least match the life-time of corresponding <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentationanalysis">PassInstrumentationAnalysis</a> (which usually is till the end of current compilation). <a href="#a405394a2ffc8cc85cd6e6be0e64d1408">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

This class provides instrumentation entry points for the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> Manager, doing calls to callbacks registered in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentationcallbacks">PassInstrumentationCallbacks</a>.

Definition at line 207 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passinstrumentation-h">PassInstrumentation.h</a>.

Callbacks object is not owned by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentation">PassInstrumentation</a>, its life-time should at least match the life-time of corresponding <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentationanalysis">PassInstrumentationAnalysis</a> (which usually is till the end of current compilation).

### invalidate() {#a58242b7112ed65072c3a1e77568d1a6a}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename IRUnitT, typename... ExtraArgsT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>bool llvm::PassInstrumentation::invalidate (IRUnitT &amp;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> class <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses">llvm::PreservedAnalyses</a> &amp;, ExtraArgsT...)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Handle invalidation from the pass manager when <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentation">PassInstrumentation</a> is used as the result of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentationanalysis">PassInstrumentationAnalysis</a>.

On attempt to invalidate just return false. There is nothing to become invalid here.

### runBeforePass() {#aead32b9af4b66a742d37585c6d6b4cbc}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename IRUnitT, typename PassT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>bool llvm::PassInstrumentation::runBeforePass (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> PassT &amp; Pass, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> IRUnitT &amp; IR) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
BeforePass instrumentation point - takes <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a></code> instance to be executed and constant reference to IR it operates on.

\\Returns true if pass is allowed to be executed. These are only run on optional pass since required passes must always be run. This allows these callbacks to print info when they want to skip a pass.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passinstrumentation-h/#l00244">244</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passinstrumentation-h">PassInstrumentation.h</a>.
